inclusion.criterion: Known diagnosis of SCD based on sickle cell tests and hemoglobin electrophoresis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Acute onset of painful crises, defined as having an onset within 7 days
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a known history of Sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. He has been treated with oxycodone, but it was not beneficial.
